topic.title: How to Flag Content Using Images

body.p: You can mark the elements that match a specific profiling condition using images (one for the start, one for the end). The image references are relative to the DITAVAL file.
body.codeblock:
<val> <prop action="flag" att="product" val="MyProd" backcolor="blue" color="yellow" >
<startflag imageref="startflag.jpg"> <alt-text>This is the start of my product info</alt-text> </startflag>
<endflag imageref="endflag.jpg"> <alt-text>This is the end of my product info</alt-text> </endflag> </prop> </val>
